short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select how many cards you want to add at once with a click of a button on Quizlet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension seamlessly adds another button on Quizlet that allows you to enter how many cards you wanted added, then *poof* all your cards appear. No more needing to manually click add card over and over again.

This allows copying and pasting to be a lot quicker.
